Join us in taking part in City Hall Selfie Day Monday, August 15!ü§≥

Want to celebrate the great work of #localgov? Join us for @ELGL50‚Äôs #CityHallSelfie Day on Aug 15! All you have to do is take a photo in front of your fav govt building & use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie. And while you‚Äôre at it, tag us @WashCoOregon! pic.twitter.com/PXKAndXYWo
